---
id: totp-secret-generation
title: "TOTP secret generation"
description: "The API generates a Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) secret for two-factor authentication (2FA). The secret is used to create TOTP codes that enhance the security of user accounts."
sidebar_label: "TOTP secret generation"

sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"TOTP secret generation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/totp-secret"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API generates a Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) secret for two-factor authentication (2FA). The secret is used to create TOTP codes that enhance the security of user accounts.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
